In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, the **spellbook of slow monster** allows a player to learn the **spell of slow monster**. It is a level 2 [enchantment spell](/wiki/Enchantment_spell "Enchantment spell"), and the [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") takes 4 actions to read.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)
- [2 Effects](#Effects)
- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [4 History](#History)
- [5 Messages](#Messages)
- [6 References](#References)

## Generation

[Wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard") may receive this spellbook as their starting non-[force bolt](/wiki/Spell_of_force_bolt "Spell of force bolt") spellbook.

## Effects

When cast, the spell acts similarly to a [wand of slow monster](/wiki/Wand_of_slow_monster "Wand of slow monster"): if you cast it at a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") and they do not resist, it renders them slow (i.e. 2/3 of their normal speed). If the target(s) were already [fast](/wiki/Fast "Fast"), they are returned to normal speed. If cast at a [vortex](/wiki/Vortex "Vortex") or [air elemental](/wiki/Air_elemental "Air elemental") while it has you [engulfed](/wiki/Engulfed "Engulfed"), you are immediately expelled.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1) If zapped at yourself, you lose any intrinsic speed you have.

## Strategy

The spell of slow monster is considered inferior to the [sleep](/wiki/Spellbook_of_sleep "Spellbook of sleep") spell in most applicable scenarios, unless the target monster(s) has both high [speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed") and [sleep resistance](/wiki/Sleep_resistance "Sleep resistance"), such as [energy vortexes](/wiki/Energy_vortex "Energy vortex") and [Vlad the Impaler](/wiki/Vlad_the_Impaler "Vlad the Impaler") - such monsters are generally rare, however. The spell is also somewhat useful for escaping whirly engulfing monsters; this gives it a marginal use case on the [Plane of Air](/wiki/Plane_of_Air "Plane of Air"), where it will allow you to escape [air elementals](/wiki/Air_elemental "Air elemental").

Pacifist may find this more useful for deterring dangerous monsters and/or escaping some engulfers; many other players prefer to read it for confusion-on-demand from forgetting the spell, then [polypile](/wiki/Polypile "Polypile") it or blank it to write another desired spellbook with a [magic marker](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker").

## History

The spellbook of slow monster and its spell first appear in [NetHack 1.3d](/wiki/NetHack_1.3d "NetHack 1.3d").

## Messages

- \<Monster> seems to be moving slower.

  You zapped a monster, and it has been slowed.

- You disrupt \<monster>! A huge hole opens up...

  You zapped it at a vortex or air elemental who was engulfing you, and will be expelled.

- You slow down

  You zapped yourself, and no longer have the speed intrinsic.

- Your quickness feels less natural.

  You zapped yourself and no longer have the speed intrinsic, but you still have extrinsic speed from your speed boots.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [Spl1-343.txt](/wiki/Spl1-343.txt "Spl1-343.txt")
